name: Mmgallery
tagline: mixed media gallery with filter & pagination
body: This is a work in progress...attempting to update the chapter I wrote in [Black Magic Solutions for White Hat SharePoint](http://www.amazon.com/Black-Magic-Solutions-White-SharePoint-ebook/dp/B00ECGQ1G0) by playing with a version that uses Knockout.js. Follow along to watch the progress!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
